extendedInfo.description: This is a touch sensitive Live Wallpaper!Every touch on screen can generate a sound of water drop. You can tap the phone and have a water ripple effect.You can change different backgrounds, enable or disable the sound, change the radius and the displacement of water wave.This LWP is very dinamic, download this interactive Live Wallpaper!Features:- work in portrait mode and landscape mode;- 3 background themes;- Change water ripple radius after touching;- Change water ripple displacement after touching;- Enable or disable the tail;- Enable or disable the sound;- Support most resolutions including Android 3.0 tablet.Warning, very important! After the installation you will find this application along with all the Live Wallpapers to your smartphone or tablet, then click on:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live WallpapersEnd user license agreement:We don't, in any way, shape or form, claim any ownership to the characters, images, or anything else related on the content of our app. All images used in this software product are owned and are copyrights of their respective owners. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of the software is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. We are not affiliated with this company. This must be regarded as a fan app, we are loyal fans. This app made by fans for fans, and it's for entertainment purposes only.Policy transparency regarding the advertisements included:Thanks for installing this app. Creating an app takes time and money. To attempt to keep this app 100% Free this app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray. You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app (Drag and Drop to the garbage).Tap on screen to ACCEPT the terms or close the app and uninstall it if you don't agree the terms. You can optout notification ads for AirPush optout: http://www.airpush.com/optout anf for LeadBolt optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com
